## Quick Start

### Building Reports Locally

```bash
cd MultistateModelsTests/reports
quarto render
```

### Recording Test Results

```julia
# After running tests manually
include("scripts/test_cache.jl")
record_test_result(:hazards, passed=15, failed=0, errors=0)
record_test_result(:simulation, passed=8, failed=0, errors=0)
```

### Checking Cache Status

```bash
julia --project=. scripts/refresh_cache.jl
```
